other_tests.findings: Gallbladder contains stones with mild distension and more prominent mild pericholecystic fluid compared to prior exam; liver structure normal; no intrahepatic biliary dilation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Mild pericholecystic fluid is more prominent compared to prior exam.

other_tests.findings: Resection of gallbladder, percutaneous endoscopic approach.
